What was put in your head to make you think that you are hot enough,nice enough, funny enough, or smart enough to treat me like shit??? What is your deal.. whatever it is it has pissed me the freak off....Well Im venting in my other place to save yall from seeing my obsecnities... peace

Alright.. I know I already wrote in this thing once today.. but I have to share this quite funny conversation between me and matt today.. (The topic was oral sex haha)...

H- Hey did you know that spooge contains 2000calories per serving haha...

M- Hanna, thats like more then your supposed to have in a day... But some girls  just spit it out after they are  done doing it..

H-  If your going to do it, Go hard or go home.. haha

M- If I go home, hard, Im pissed...

    haha it was hilarious.. Maybe you had to be thier.. Their was some more comments added about me and having had a long distance relationship for most of the past year but those are to crude to be put in here... Well Im outta here hoes!!! Peace...
OMGA.. I am soo bad... I really am... Someone hold me back because I think Im going insane... What the heck was I thinking.. Honestly... Whew.. Well Im outta of here.. Peace..

"I'm gonna be here for you baby,
I'll be a man of my word
Speak the language in a voice that you have never heard
I want to sleep with you forever
I want to die in your arms
In a cabin by a meadow where the wild bees swarm."

 ok... this is my quote of the day, from my new favorite song by Keith Urban.. Im really wanting a man of his word, someone thats going to be there for me... Im not trying to sound cocky or anything but I think that Im an ok girlfriend... I mean ya I do have a jealous tendency to me... but thats only because I care.. (Oh and the fact that I was cheated on by a previous boyfriend doesnt really help the cause)  but ya... Im not to sure why Im talking about this on here.. Maybe because Im tired of being placed on the back burner of a couple peoples lives... haha Im just ready to be where you are..

My future boy- Here are the things that you need to be aware of..Im a girl thats been through a lot.. Have had my heart broken more then once.. but then again.. I  am Hanna and I can get through all of that.. I love to laugh and I love to cuddle...Its not going to be easy for you to find out my hidden talents.. it does take awhile for you to get those out of me.. I have to to be a priority in your life!Im not saying treat me like a queen (even though that would be quite nice) but still I need to be a top priority.. Your going to have to learn to accept my love of WVU football and of the Newlyweds... You might not want to give me a credit card because I do like to shop and the truck I might like to drive.. haha Dale jr is my second love and if you take me to a race.. Ill be stuck on you forever.. The song "Lay you down" is a real important song to me so if you do something with it, I know you are serious.. I am going off to school next year, but do not worry because I am a very committed person.. Never once cheated and never plan on it.. I know to well what that feels like.. I just want to be loved and show you how much I love you... Lets make memories of us.. xoxo ~H

 

Ya.. that is a letter I plan to give to my future boy.. not really sure why I put it in here.. Its kinda a rough draft so if future boy is out there and he reads it.. Dont let me know you have already read it.. Well my phone is ringing and I am really hoping that it is you... Yet somehow I seriously doubt it... haha you do never know what you have missed until it is gone.. Maybe someday you too will realize it.. Im outta here..

Weird night.... Well I rear ended Trish's car tonight.. Rainy.. not good.... Well I guess Ill figure out how much damage there is to my car in the morning.... BUT I did have a wonderful night when I wasnt thinking about that... went and saw A Lot Like Love.. with Ashton Kutcher.. greatgreat movie... love/date type movie... Well been given the nickname at work of the "New Panera Slut" haha you dont really want to ask how that one came to be.. I love those girls....

OH and ya.. Im finally finished....

       Well to all you lovely people.. I must be going... xoxo~H

You all will NEVER guess who I was out with tonight.... Arent I just a lucky one?!?  Im on the phone.. so peace..

Yes... Prom was last night and it was AMAZING...

Yesterday started off a little hectic because I had to be up at 6am for work.. But when I was finished working at 1230.. things started to get exciting.. I lounged for part of the afternoon and then was in a complete rush to get ready.. Well we met everybody @Linds.. and their was our SWEETT limo.. Well after doing the flower and pic thing we started out to prom only to realize that Jen didnt have a ticket.. Well after my sister chased the limo down we sloved that little problem.. Well we got to the place and did pictures and all that stuff.. Im going to skip talking about the dinner and stuff and go straight to the good part, the dance.. Well in the builiding the floor is like a tramp..It has 6inches of leeway to go up and down and it was insane... We danced like the whole night it was complete craziness.. haha except "going to the restroom" about 20 times to  ditch certain people.. But it was insane.. Omga we didnt even know the names of some of the people we danced with.. If they looked like they were hvaing fun, we joined them..I cant believe it was senior prom.. Well after the dance I went home and took a shower because I felt completely gross and then we got all cute and went out.. Around 4ish we somehow made our way to Jen's house where we crashed... BIG TIME.. Well ya, so overall last night was definitely the best dance I have ever been too.. Cant believe its over already.. Now all thats left to look forward to is graduation... heck ya!! Well I will have pictures posted by tuesday.. atleast Ill try my hardest.. Well I have to work today so Im going to go and take a shower... Call me lovies....

"Mmmm girl..."haha hilarious... alrighty xoxo ~H

WOW~ So much to update on and its only been a few days... Well I got a job!! haha ya.. I am actually going to WORK for my money... The incentive of a new phone has really gotten to me so now Im actually going to do something about it.  Oh yea.. Its at Panera with Ashley and Jill, so you guys can come see me.. haha

WELL PROM IS 2 DAYS AWAY!!!!! I am soosooosooosoooo excited... Going tanning tomorrow so I will hopefully be dark.. getting a peticure and my nails did.. plannin on looking hott!! haha but I have to work both saturday morning AND sunday night so that kinda sucks.. but hey you have to do what you got to do... For all of you who are not going.. no worries I will have pictures posted on the website of my night as soon as I get them in... Im so excited... I just cant hide it.. We alls gonna shake it like a salt shaka.... Yay!!!

OH I got my computer allowance from my mammaw...boy oh boy am I lucky.. I think Im going to take my left over money and by myself a digital camera.. So I can take pictures and stuff.. hahaha..

Well I thought Id let you all know what is going on.. Well Im headed to a hair "dress rehersal" and then going shopping with my momma for new khakis and polos for work and accessories for prom.. Well much love to yall!! xoxo

Well Im real cool.. Ya I just accidently hit the wrong number on my speedial and dialed "him". Ya he called back and I felt like a dumbass so I found myself apologizing for my attitude.. Uhh Im such an idiot.. I should have just told him the truth instead of apologizing.. The two things that Im trying to stop doing I did em both in the period of 2 seconds.. Well what can ya do? Well damn it, this crap is a lot harder then I thought it was going to be.. Well I think Im going to go tan....

 

 FYI-5 DAYS UNTIL PROM!!! CAN YOU SAY EXCITED.......

just wish I wasnt dealing with all of this crap tho...

Ever since the day you went away
And left me lonely and cold
My life just hasn't been the same
Oh baby no
When I looked into your eyes
The moment that I let you go I just broke down (down)

Baby if I ever get the chance to be with you again I would sacrifice
'Cause the feelin that I feel within no other man
Would ever make me feel so right

It's nice to smile when I get your phone call at night
But I'd rather have you here with me
Right next to me
And I miss the way you hold me tight

I've got to let you know I feel so weak without your touch
I never thought that I could ever love a man so much
I've gotta let you know I think that we are destiny
For you I'd cross the world for you
I'd do anything

That's right baby
I'm goin' crazy
I need to be your lady
I've been thinking lately
That you and me, yes we can make it
Just ride with me, roll with me
I'm in love with you (baby)

Its over... for good.  I tend to laugh at how I used to think that it was all me, how if I did this for him, he would stay. Or if I said the write words it would magically make things better. Boy was I young then...  Thier is no way you can be with someone who doesnt have the same way of looking at the relationship.. its just not going to work.

              Funny, he told me a while ago that if I loved him, other people shouldnt phase me.  Yeah they dont. But where does this hold up for him at?  Why am I not allowing myself to move away from him.. why cant I get over that hurdle of needing him.. haha someones profile says that something about their is a reason why the people of your past didnt make into your future...I guess Im another damn statistic.. But I cannot allow myself to be hurt.. nor to be in a situation where I am not comfortable nor happy.  Its not fair to me, its not fair to him... and since neither one of us can change, we are apparently just throwing the whole damn thing down the drain....

 He said goodbye once.. and somehow I knew he'd be back.. He said goodbye again... and this time I wasnt so  sure so I begged him to come back.. Well for a third time he's said goodbye.. and thats it.  I cant allow myself to be begging  him back. I cannot stop my life for something I have no control over... I was so prod of myself last night when he said that... I didnt even try to fight it.. I took the words that he has said to me a gizillion times.."whatever". All I can do is find happiness for myself.. If he loved me..he will soon realize it..  When you love a person so much and they are not in your life.. you definently notice that void and you definitely do everything you can to get back to them. I guess this is really going to test my faith in him and my faith in myself?

Well Im off to do some taebo before school... Thank goodness today is swamped... Its time to pick of whats left of the pieces of me and pull myself together... In the words of took "Keep your chin up girl, and walk like you own the place" Well Took, if your up thier listening... Im trying girlie,but you never told me boys would suck like they do!"

OMGA.... dont you just loovveee it when people put photos up of you online?? Haha thanks to Chels.. she put a horrible picture of me and Cait from Easter weekend when we were in WV... ahh I am soo embarassed.. Note to anyone who sees that picture.. It was REALLY late at night and I was really having an off day.. Well Im going to go beg her to take it down.. Ah we will see how this goes.. Well Im off... going to go cruisin wit my girls... muah

Sometimes I wonder
How I'd ever make it through
Through this world without having you
I just wouldn't have a clue
Sometimes it seems like this world's closing in on me
And there's no way of breaking free
Then I see you reach out for me, oh
Sometimes I wanna give up
Wanna give in
Wanna quit the fight

Then one look at you baby
Can make everything alright
Make everything alright

When I see you smile
I can face the world
Oh, you know that I can do anything
When I see you smile
I see a ray of light
Oh I see it shining right through the rain
When I see you smile
Baby when I see you smile at me

Baby there's nothing in this world that could ever do
What the touch of your hands can do
It's like nothing I ever knew
And when the rain is fallin'
I don't feel it 'coz you're here with me
And one look at you baby
Is all I ever need
It's all that I ever need
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Hanging in their~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Life is moving on~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

" God send me an angel.. to heal my broken heart, from being in love, Cause all I do, is cry...."

Look at the time.. Well its approxiamtely 1 hour since I lost my best friend and as you can see, Im not taking it too well. I changed my picture to my depressing senior one. This flat out sucks.. I honestly dont know what to do...

      I cannot let myself sit by and know that he is dating other people.. I honestly dont know what else I can do to make him happy. I know its my choice to be devoted to him but I cant help it. I cannot make myself go out with anybody else.. But then again, I dont want to let myself be hurt. That was the main reason I went for this relationship, even knowing it would be hard. He came in and tore down the walls around my heart. In turn, I gave him my heart trusting him not to break it.. Ya, I cant get that back now.. I dont even think I want it back. I dunno.. Its funny to me how we had a conversation awhile ago. and he said "Hanna, if those guys tempt you now, whats going to happen when your with me? They shouldnt even matter to you." Hes right. They dont matter to me, what matters to me is him, and obviously I cant have him... WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO? I dunno anymore. Ive tried what my friends have said, Ive tried what my mom has said, Ive even tried what my 14 year old sister has said. Im at a loss.. But I refuse to continue to hurt.. I cant live my life unhappy... Funny thing is, the only thing that will make me happy, I cant have.  127 days till I move.. 127.. Thats like 4 months.. thats it.. and now, we are having all these problems. Here, let me lay it all out for you:

HEY~ I WANT TO BE WITH YOU. I want us to be together. I love you with everything, but I cannot sit by anymore... You need to figure out where you want to be and what makes you happy. Baby, Im at the end of my rope, Im out of ideas or ways that I can change so I can make you happy. You know I love you with everything in me and more, but obviously that is not enough...  You bring so much happiness to my life and Im totally amazed by you.. ( Um why cant we just go down to Kokomo and get away from it all ;)  No guy has ever made me feel the way you do, and no guy ever will.  I want us to be one, I want to be a team..Im playing for keeps now.. Thanks to boys of the past, Ive been cursed with the jealous gene.. You already know this but Im telling you again, Because of that, you suffer. Im sorry but I dont share things... especially my guy.. (Its kinda like in Kindegarten when I wouldnt share my favorite bunny even with my best friend... nuuh the things I loveI tend to keep for myself) My feelings will NEVER change for you and I love you more then life itself, but I cant handle this anymore.. The ball is in your court.. So now your going to have to choose. I love you, Im here for you, and I support whatever decision you decide.... (Oh Ya.. Hopefully your give'a'damn isnt busted just yet)

 

Thiers nothing I can do now... Ive stated where Im at and all I can do is pray that he decides where he wants to be as well. (Now I know how the men felt on the Bachelorette... having to lay it all out and trusting that Jen would do the right thing) Well I hope this situation doesnt turn out like the Bachelorette because she ended up not choosing either of them.. Well I think Im going to go and toss n turn in my bed some more..Yall, Im needing ya now more then ever...I just want to smile again..

forever~H

Wad up? Wad up?  Not so much going on here.. Its like 11:15 on Friday night and Im actually tired and about ready to go to bed!?! Crazy huh.. Well the past two days have been weird so now Im catching up on my sleep.. YOULL NEVER GUESS WHO CALLED ME LAST NIGHT.....WESLEY! Yeah, Wesley just called out of the blue and was like "Hows Miss, Hanna Faith from the North.." haha he said that he was just thinking about us and decided to give me a ring.. He wants me to go to Alabama University and I was like haha sike! We talked for awhile and he mentioned something about coming up and surprising me... ha believe it when I see it.. Crazy Alabamian...

         Today Kris and me went to the baseball game where yet again East beat Hamilton.. haha all my friends were giving her a hard time for sitting on our side.. It was the perfect day for a ball game and the weather was crazy gorgeous and we had a lot of fun.. Well we were late to church so we flew down 129 and got to church for the Mission Trip dinner.. Yes you dont have to ask, it was way boring... But ya gots to do what ya gots to do... Well ya and I hung with people for a bit and now I am here.. Yes nothing to exciting.. I do believe I am shopping with my madre tomorrow while are cleaning lady is here... Gots to love coming home to a clean house... Well ya, Im going to head out for now... holla at your girl!

Yo yall... whats been going on? Well the past two days have been quite hectic, and now they are over and I am happy. Well today was the memorial service for Ben. It was very sad/happy. It was sad because he is gone, and thier is a space where he used to be. In turn, it is happy because we know that Ben is in Heaven and that he is playing hockey up thier and having the time of his life. I am thankful for the people of my gradtuating class. Its amazing to see how we are all able to come together and be full of support and love for one another.  

Thier is currently only.....36 school days left until graduation, can you say hooray?

Well last night was veryveryvery interesting and veryveryvery good.  It is kind of amazing the support a friend has for each other. I was up till around 1, but it was definitely worth it. 

OH YEAH... guess what? My Lakota boys beat my Hamilton boys yesterday....4-2. What now? Yes, they do play again tomorrow at home and I do plan to make an appearance... I have to go to a dinner for our Mexico Mission Trip but I do have to see Jordan hit a home run.. and Brad strike out T.... what do I say time and time again.. Ya cant stop us!!

       The countdown to prom is um 8 days... Yes, I am starting to freak. I still do not have shoes for my dress. I still need to order the flowers.. Yes, I still need to figure out what the heck Im going to do afterwards.. ahh!! Crazyness....

            Well I just delievered yall a brief summary of whats been going on in my life. Yall think of me as I have 2 weeks to make this college decision.. I honestly am up in the air where I will end up... Well I am off to finish my homework and pick another skirt for tomorrow.. (Dont you just love spring.. the skirts are "legal" and so are the flipflops.. haha in the words of Ms.Schmidt wensday" Hanna, I just dont see how you can wear those thong things.."(ok you dirty people.. she was referring to my shoes using an oldschool term.) Oh my gosh, I just used the word oldschool for that I should be shot. OKOK Im really leaving now.. their is a way hott guy on the phone and he's asking for me.(g rent)....love and MUCHO happiness to you and your lovers... peace

Well he's gone. Ben died early Monday morning around 8:30 am.  God called him home, and so now he is at peace.  The service is Thursday at noon.. Please pray for the Feazel family as well as the Lakota East Seniors.

http://www.wkrc.com/news/local/story.aspx?content_id=D845ED32-DE01-4D59-AC7B-2DE515B78A13

   a website where you can see the story about his accident....

 It has been surreal, kinda like a daze.. Its weird to see the empty chair and the empty parking lot.  People are hurting.. a lot of us are. The only thing that gives us hope is that Ben is in a better place and he would not want to live he was to be a vegtable the rest of his life.  Its still kinda in a shock effect. Sometimes it does sink in and sometimes I just choose to overlook it. 

                 RIP Ben Feazel (April 4,2005) ~ we know that your with the angels now...

Ive heard more then once that highschool is supposed to be the time of your life.. This is not being proved to me.  Ben Feazel is currently lying in a hospital with one of two options.. He is either A) going to die from being thrown off his motorcycle because some lady cannot read intersection signs. or B)By God's wonderful grace Ben will somehow pull through and remain in a vegatative state the rest of his life.   Tell me how this can be good?  Its amazing that two seconds can make or break something so valuable as a human life.  How fair is it that Ben wont get to leave for the marines on June 12th, or go to his senior prom, or graduate with all of his friends..

       We are still holding on to that one glimmer of hope that a miracle will occur in his life.. Say a prayer for the Feazel family and say a prayer for Ben.. If anything pray that he isnt in any pain..

OMGA!! Have you ever had someone from the past just suddenly appear back in your life???? That was totally happening to me today.. So on the way home me and Kris were just chatting about everything.. And we got on two people who we havent talked to or heard from in forever and tonight they BOTH immed me at different times.. Crazy eh? Or maybe Fate? I dunno whats going on.. Some guy said last night "We have one warm day and everyone goes Crazy!" that about sums up everything.. Well my precious few hours are ticking away.. Peace out niggas!!

Went shopping and tanning today.. Nothing exciting... but lemme tell you.. I CANT WAIT till tommorrow night... Woohoo its going to be freakin awesome.. Well Im off to bed... Call me tommorrow, Im just going to the gym and tanning during the day, nothing special... well nighty night

~ieu~

Hey people, guess what.... Its Spring Break!! Ya... Well tommorrow we are going to West Virginia for Easter.. Im kinda excited about that because my momma is taking me shopping for Prom and then all the spring fun that goes with it haha... And then next week Im coming home and probably going to be visiting Lakota beach(aka..tanning bed) like a gazillion times, Just so I can look like I kind of went somewhere then for the rest of the week Ill hang out with Mike, Mitch and Linds.. possibly Jen and possibly go up to OU for a "college visit".. Well I must be going... holla at ur girl

OH YEAH.. not sure what Im doing tonight.. Havent made definite plans.. SO I guess just call me and find out where I ended up... xoxo

Hey all you beauiful people!! What is going on? Not a lot here.. Trying to motivate myself to finish my homework.. We only have 1 day till Spring Break.. Can you say woohoo! Im so excited to be able to relax/shop/ and work out.. Ya Im leaving on friday for West Virginia and its going to be quite nice to be able to get away.. Nothings better then a day up in the country hanging with all the rednecks..haha

       My mood today, is actually quite good...Compared to the last few days... Im wonderful... I realized that moping around isnt going to get me anywhere..Im slowly picking up the pieces and getting back to reality... Ya, Im sad.. REAL SAD, but Im not going to be a wreck forever... We're starting on the road back to singleness.. Its a rough road, and ya well not a fun one.. But what can  I do??? Nothing, at the moment.. Yes... I miss him! BUT ok Im going to stop now...no more!! Survivor.. remember??

So I heard this song.. and Ive come to conclusion that Ill know the guy Im supposed to marry if he does something with this song with out me telling.. Great song!!

There's songs and poems and promises and dreams that might be true.
But I wont talk of stary skies or moonlight on the ground,
I'll come right out and tell you, I'd just love to lay you down.

I'll let you know how much it means just havin' you around.

There's so many ways your sweet love made this house into a home.
You've got a way of doin' little things that turn me on.
Like standin' in the kitchen in your faded cotton gown,
With your hair all up in curlers, I'd still love to lay ya down.

Lay ya down and softly whisper pretty love words in your ear.
Lay ya down and tell you all the things a woman loves to hear.
I'll let you know how much it means just havin' you around.
Oh darlin', how I'd love to lay you down.

When a whole lot of Decembers are showin' in your face.
Your auburn hair has faded and silver takes it's place.
You'll be just as lovely and I'll still be around.
And if I can, I know that I'd still love to lay you down.

Lay ya down and softly whisper pretty love words in your ear.
Lay ya down and tell you all the things a woman loves to hear.
I'll let you know how much it means just havin' you around.
Oh darlin', how I'd love to lay you down.

Yes... if my future husband is reading this, if ya play this song for me, that will be the sign haha... Alright well Im acting 
like a fag, so Im going to go talk to Mitchell... send me love.. xoxo 
*rob*

Ehhh... Its been one of those days... No, actually its been pretty good. Cole is still staying with us so Im having a blast playing hotwheels and watching Finding Nemo.. He got kinda mad at me that I wouldnt let him sleep in my bed tonight with me, but rules are rules.. haha Well yes I have realized that six months is a long time.. Yeah, today would have been six months for me and Rob. Its kinda crazy when ya think about it.... Six months is a mark when you know youll definently remember the relationship forever... Yep that is so true.  Well today I got home and stuff and I can tell that tonight Im going to be dying for some UDF... just cause thats what girls crave on days like this. BUT we have prom in less then a month so Im going to head to the gym.... The best way to get your mind off things is to put in an upbeat cd and just run all your worries away.. Now, if you try and go to the gym in his shirt and listen to a cd that HE made, then you probably wont be doing much in the means of getting your mind off of him.. haha

            Well I just found out that Mitch and Bill arent going to prom because they arent "feeling" it... What is that??? Yes Jen, Lindz, and I spent all of 5 and 6pd trying to get them to go. HEY.. you boys.. I know you read this, just go!! My gosh you know we all are determined to have fun. stop being party poopers!! haha So Ill just take it that you both will be ordering tuxes tom, that is if your both smart.. Otherwise Hanna is going to kicking your butt..

         Well Spring Break starts Thursday and Im way excited... Everyones coming home from college so its going to be nice and catch up with them.. Im leaving for West Virginia on Friday, to see the gparents, find a prom dress, and support my Mountaineer boys!!!haha I love it..

Im going to get off of this thing and finish my calculus so I can head to the gym... Sorry the pictures old, I refuse to let anyone see any pictures of me until Im done "changing".. Well lots of love to yall xoxo

Alright... Im going to be honest.. I lied to yall yesterday.. I told you I hated him.. and I dont.. Im not saying that I dont have some strong negative feelings following his way, but hate is such a strong word. 

       Ummm pain... thats all I feel right about now.. I never in a million years thought that I could get this wrapped up in a relationship, much less fall so far into one.  Im Hanna... I can normally handle everything... not him.  He is my weakness and he is well aware of that, and sometimes he can use to his advantage.. Heck, I would if I had that much "power". Well ya I really dont feel like sharing anymore with you all about what Im feeling now, because I do know each of you and I do know that you can hold my statements against me in the future.. Well I just need yalls lovin right now, thats all. I will get through this someway,somehow. And in the end, I know I will come out a better person because of it.. Ya, Im real tempted to head down to UDF and buy me a big fat tub of cookiedough icecream.. but I refuse.. I will go do yoga, and clear my mind.. Even though desperate situations call for UDF, and this IS a desperate situation.. its already past 8, so no more eating for the night.. If yad like... call me up, or even stop in, that would even be better..

Im a survivor..Im not gon give up, Im not gon stop.Im gon work harder... Im a survivor, Im gonna make it,I will survive, Keep on surviving.. ( you have got to love Destiny's Child, they always keep ya trekking...haha be thankful Im not singing "No scrubs" or something like that)

Oh yes... due to some painful news.. I will temporarily be absent from the next few Nextel cup races... )

well Im outta here.. leave me LOTS of love, xoxo

P.S    GO MOUNTATINEERS!!

I HATE HIM... I HATE HOW HE MAKES ME FEEL, I HATE HOW HE WALKED OUT AND DIDNT LOOK BACK. I HATE THE LOVE HE PRETENDED TO HAVE FOR ME FOR THE PAST SIX MONTHS.. I HATE THAT YOU DONT CARE THAT I GAVE YOU MY HEART... ITS ALL ABOUT YOU APRRARENTLY..

 

No Im not going to cry.... Im not going to let him hurt me. He isnt giong to tear me down... I know that Im a strong person and I can survive without him. As I sit here... this day has been an emotional rollercoaster.. well that is an understatement. Well someone always told me that when your feeling depressed bring out the sexy side that every woman possesses. SO I have just returned from a candlelit bath, filled with Victoria Secret bubbles and Delilah music. I brought out that sexy side and I can say it is already helping me feel so much better.

      This afternoon I looked at as the death of a dream.  I thought of it as loosing the love of my life.. All the inside jokes dealing with songs like Kokomo and movies like Sandlot and Remember the Titans and arguments over whether FSU is better then WVU (thier not!!) I thought that I would never be able to turn the Bachelor pad into a chic house or ride on the back of the streetbike.  I looked at today as then end. The end of everything I have been praying for and wishing for since I dont know when.  I wanted to run to him. I wanted him to make everything better like usual, I wanted him to tell me that I was a dork and that he loved me more.. but I cant. Ive realized that I cant look at it like this.. I cant lie around in his shirt which lingers with his scent and cry, forever.. Ya sure I can do that for a couple of days but what good is that going to do?

      Why should I mourn about it all when I can be on my knees thanking god for putting him in my life for the past 6 months.. Why cant I be happy for every night that he tucked me in bed and so many mornings when he woke me up?  Why cant I be thankful for the magical weekend we shared? Im not saying that Im not happy about all of this but I tend to be sad about it all. Who knows what is going to happen? Neither he nor I know what we are going to do tommorrow night much less in a couple months... I cant finish the story if I do not know what is going to happen..

     I am pretty sure that this isnt the end of us. Will Smith told Oprah that everyday him and Jada reevaluate thier relationship because its always changing. If someone has the same relationship to a person they are eventually going to end. Couples need to be asking each other what they can do to help the other, what changes need to be made. (Well if I am going to listen to anybodys advie, its going to be Will Smith, he knows what is going to happen)

So I am determined not to look at this "period" as a good thing. In four months Ill be in a whole new place a whole new life. Im sure rob will still be a part of that new life, we just think that right now its alittle unclear what we are going to "be"...

Im so thankful to God for all that he is given me, I am so blessed. I do realize that I need to draw close to him though.. Ive tended to put god on the back burner in life. Ever since my summer from below, I have drawn away from god. I need to get my relationship right with him before I can do anything in life. He is the one that is going to be with me through it all... He is always their. and I am so thankful for that.."Lord prepare me, to be a sanctuary, pure and holy, tried and true.. with thanksgiving, Ill be a living, Sanctuary for you.."

 

Well I think I have come to the end of my "revelation" on my relationship.. If your wondering yes... Ill prolly still wear his shirt for a day or two.. and yes Ill play our song maybe one, two, a bizillion times.. but hey you have to cut me some slack.. Whether he is my boyfriend or not, hes always going to be two things to me. 1- he will always be my best friend. and 2-he will always ALWAYS be my boy... Well Im off to go finish trying to find my sexy self... haha, xoxo

As I sit here and write, it appears to me that it is only 10:34...Its early and Im home. It is early, we have no school tommorrow and I am home. Well I think you can guess where my story is going.  Tonight was an interesting one, filled with a lot of emotions and a lot of pain.

        I went to St. Clair tonight for church with Jen and Molly because Molly wanted to see Andrew. Well when we got thier, I knew immediately that something didnt feel right.. Well when it was time to shake hands I felt someones' hand glid over  the small of my back and then that someone sat down right next to me.. Well as I turned to my right I saw who the hand belonged too, Ty.  Well needless to say that sermon was very uncomfortable.. Here I am, sitting next to my best friend and a guy who cheated on me and I havent talked to formally in months.. (I was very close to with Jen that was for sure.) Well after the service he said we needed to talk and quite frankly Im tired of talking.. It seems like everyone is saying "We need to talk" but he said he had to get somethings off his chest so I gave him that..

    I never realized how hard it is to look at someone who has hurt you so badly.  As soon as I saw him, a rush of pain and hurt feelings came over me. Something I havent felt nor wanted to feel in a long time.  He told me he was amazed how long it had been since we had been civil and it was weird for him to see me "happy". Apparently everyother time we had seen each other previously I had been upset or down.  I do not think he realized the "death of his dream" until tonight. It was tough and I did shed tears, not tears of sadness so to speak but tears off frustration. I had to sit their and tell him that I did not deserve the way he treated me or the things that I had been said. I had to tell him that although we had been on and off in the past, that it was not going to happen again.. From almost a year ago when I said goodbye, I was still firm in my standings.. We are not going to be together.. It just is not going to happen.  Yes, I used to think that I did love him and yes I cared about him tremendously but what seemed so perfect in the past, doesnt always mean that it would be perfect forever.  He talked about being friends and I said I would think about it, but how can you expect to be friends with someone who you were with for a long period of time and expect things to be normal.. I dont think that it is possible... I decided that it would be best if the conversation just ended at that so I said my goodbye and he gave me a hug and I left..

           It is just so frustrating to me to have past feelings get mixed up with current feelings.. Life seemed to be going so smoothly it seemed like things were coming together but somehow as soon as I saw him, all the pain and hurt that was in my life for so many years just came back instantly.. How do you get rid of that?

         WELL so now I am home. and I have vented..all that thier is to be said is that my heart is somewhere else and it is not with Ty anymore.. Looking back a year ago I would swear on my life that I would never say something like that.. But here I am saying it and actually meaning it..  I heard the words " No one will ever love you like I did"  but my response to that is " No hopefully noonne will never love me like you did, because you showed your love to me by cheating"  It is over. It is done.  The storybook is closed.... forever.. and just so you know Im sure Ill live happily ever after even though it is not with him..My prince charming found me in my time of need, he took my broken heart and made it whole and he is all I could ever imagine and more...

Im thinking that late nights and annoying parents dont sit so well with me... I love this thing, I really do. Its a great place to vent my feelings without anyone telling me to not say something... So heres a situation and tell me if Im wrong...

     Theres this guy right, and um we are "somewhat" together, or we were... Well so I call him on Saturday night and we talk for a bit and then he says that he has to run real QUICK and talk to his parents... Well so that was about um 11:20 pm.. So I call him back at 12:30 am... a whole hour and 10 minutes later.. Nothing... So I text a couple times and I get no response.. So Im like whatever and go to bed. (Keep in mind that it really SUCKS to wait for someone and then find out they arent calling) So Sunday goes by I hear nothing.. No email, no nothing, to tell me what happened the previous night... Now If I was the one that didnt call back, I would atleast give them a reason, even if it was that they fell asleep.. but I got nada.. Well I let that go and just moved on..

SOOOO Monday was valentines day.. ya know the day where you show your love? Well I email him and say Happy Valentines Day (still havent heard ANYTHING since Saturday night when he said he would call back)) Well I get online and see that he is away... Its about 10, an hour and a half before he goes to bed... I im him and let him know Im trying to get a hold of him... Well of course he leaves the im sound on so if he was in his room he heard that... And then I call multiple times and tex as well. I get nothing... Keep in mind his phone is only on silent when A) he is in church, or B) when he is pissed.. So about the fourth time of calling, I leave a message and go to sleep.... By this point Im getting a little worried... either 1) he has been hurt and I dont know about it. or 2) he truly hates me and is over me.... So ya this morning (tuesday) I email him to see whats up.... (checking his email multiple times a day,I get nothing) I email him a second time... still nothing.. I call him (dont ask why...) NOTHING... So finally I just got an email a little bit ago that says " I dont have time to argue with you... stop being immature. I was sleeping!!"  

                 Ummm how am I supposed to respond to that.. Ya I was pissed but I never told him that.... and even if I did dont u think that he could have atleast 2seconds to email me and let me know what was up... I know we all have lives and I dont expect his to revolve around me. But when I dont hear from you in three days.. It can be kinda scary for a girl.. especially when it is from a boy she loves...

          Soo ya... that is my story and now I need your advice.. Its quite frustrating to search for someone for days with no such luck and then when I do finally get a hold of him... he gets mean...

                ( I really need Dr. Phil's advice right about now)... How can you love someone so much yet get so hurt and confused about stupid things like this... Oh tell me what to do because Im struggling here..,.. Well Sean is here so Im going to go... Muah ~H

Honestly, I thought today was going to flat out suck.. Valentines Day seems to only be nice when you are able to share it with someone you care about... Starting off today I was into an anti Valentines mode... Well that changed alot over the day.

I have a feeling that I am loved by some people.. haha I know its so shallow to base your feelings on gifts and such but I dont think people realized how much this brightend my day and made me feel important.. Ya I know I am a geek

Well besides Valentines day not a lot is going on.. I am making modifications to my diet in hopes of loosing more weight then I already am. I am serious about this. I watched a bit of Oprah today and a guy lost 500 POUNDS! My 25 isnt looking so hard after all... Well the Bachelorette is on tonight and I am excited... I mean way excited.....

      Late last night I got a call from "someone" wanting to wish me a Happy Valentines Day... Well I have a message for you.... " F- it, Dont call my house out of nowhere and tell me that crap. you have a lot of nerve, ya know..."

Well Im just adding that little message because I know that someone reads this thing constantly and I know that I havent called him in months nor do I plan on calling him in the future.. So I am just sending him my "love" through my thoughts.. haha Well Im going to go.. Muah ~Hanna

Well Im back.. This weekend was complete craziness but thank god I am home.

         Friday mom and me went to visit Carson-Newman near Knoxville, TN. I absolutely fell in love with it. The campus the people everything about it I loved... I ran into Annie Gormas while I was thier which was totally weird but we had a blast. I just felt at home while I was thier and I have a real good feeling about that college.

        After Carson- Newman we headed to Robin's house to spend the night. Well somehow we ended up at this complete redneck bar in east Tennessee singing Karaoke.. I had a blast but the place was definitely a dive. To avoid being hit on by some redneck guy named Butch me and Darby decided to sing. haha me, sing?!? Well we got up their and sang "Any man of mine" by Shania Twain... I had a blast and we even got compliments haha.

     Well Saturday morning we got up at the crack of dawn and went to Tusculum for my scholarship interview. When we first arrived on campus the place looked completely deserted...
